Model.BugReport

Class BugReport

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Mail.Subject
      • Model.BugReport.BugReport
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer<Comment>, Originator<BugReport.BugReportMemento,BugReport>

    public class BugReport
extends Subject
implements Observer<Comment>, Originator<BugReport.BugReportMemento,BugReport>
    Class representing a Bug report object. A bug report signals that something is wrong with a specific subsystem. This class provides getters and setters for most attributes. This class provides a method to create new bug reports. This class provides public checkers when setting new values to certain attributes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BugReport.BugReportMemento
      This class provides utility for saving the state of the system at a certain point in time during execution of the Bug Trap software.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BugReport

        BugReport(java.lang.String title,
          java.lang.String description,
          Issuer creator,
          boolean pblc)
   throws ReportErrorToUserException
        Default constructor for a BugReport.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the BugReport.
        description - The description of the BugReport.
        creator - The issuer of the bug report.
        pblc - True if the bug report is public.
        Throws:
        ReportErrorToUserException - The title or description is empty.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The subsystem or creator is null.

      • BugReport

        BugReport(java.lang.String title,
          java.lang.String description,
          Issuer creator,
          boolean pblc,
          TheDate creationDate,
          java.util.List<Developer> initialAssignies,
          TargetMilestone targetMilestone)
   throws ReportErrorToUserException
        Constructor for a Bugreport.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the bug report.
        description - The description of the bug report.
        creator - The creator of the bug report.
        creationDate - The creation date of this bug report.
        initialAssignies - The list of assignees for this bug report.
        targetMilestone - The target milestone of a bug report.
        pblc - The access right to this bugreport.
        Throws:
        ReportErrorToUserException - The title or description is empty.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The subsystem, creator, creationDate or tag is null.

      • restoreMemento

        public void restoreMemento(BugReport.BugReportMemento memento)
        Method used to restore an old memento. This method will restore the tag, assignees and comments of the bug report to the values as recorded in the memento object.
        Specified by:
        restoreMemento in interface Originator<BugReport.BugReportMemento,BugReport>
        Parameters:
        memento - the memento object that contains the old values
